text: Leonid Stepanovych Stadnyk (; 5 August 1970 â€“ 24 August 2014) was a Ukrainian farmer. He stood at 8 feet 5 inches or 2.57 meters. He was born in Zhytomyr Oblast, Ukrainian Soviet Socialist Republic, USSR. Stadnyk was listed as the world's tallest living man according to Guinness World Records. Stadnyk died at the age of 44 on August 24, 2014 from a brain hemorrhage. ==References== ==Other websites== * The Tallest Man: Leonid Stadnyk Category:1970 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Deaths from cerebral hemorrhage Category:Disease-related deaths in Ukraine Category:Ukrainian people Category:World record holders Category:Zhytomyr Oblast
title: Leonid Stadnyk
